title: Scarlet and the Keepers of Light
description: Scarlet Hopewell keeps having the same dream. She dreams about a magical world, where winged creatures sculpt with light, dogs talk, and Scarlet is the guest of honor at a joyous party under a mighty oak tree. One day Scarlet’s dad brings home an abandoned puppy with weird blue eyes. Dakota is fun and loving and smart—maybe too smart. And a lot too big. TV news starts to take an interest.As the school year begins, things get stranger. Ominous storms have everyone on edge, and Scarlet’s dreams are becoming darker and more vivid. When three beautiful, silver-voiced men break down the front door one night, Dakota leads the Hopewells in their escape—right into the world of Scarlet’s dreams. Scarlet and the Keepers of Light is a fantasy for all ages about the adventure of growing up, the power of the word, and finding the magic within.
author: Brandon Charles West
